name: Glitter wars
description:
You are a commander on earth. Light days away is Glitter planet on which you are fighting enemy robots. Since you are quite far away, your commands only get registered 2 days after you send them so plan ahead!

Plays like a turn based strategy game.

Tutorial: Press a unit to select it and them a tile to move too, then a direction to shoot. Do this for all your units then press end turn to advance by one day. Boxes will protect you from one shot.
